A case was opened with a short description of Password prompts in google email clients
A longer description includes Most users were being prompted for password in their google email client today, but no prompting in web browser. Changing passwords only worked for some period of time and the users were prompted again a few hours later. Where can one check status and/or event logs in relation to this prompting issue in email clients?
State: Closed

comments: Hi Ismael,

Thanks for sharing this request with us. Before we look into this with you, can you please give us the following information below:

Do you see this issue with other email clients as well, or only for Cosmetic Index?

What Google Email version is this client using?

You may follow this link below in order to enable logging:

https://support.google.com/en-us/workspace/what-is-the-enable-logging-troubleshooting-option-0fdc446d-d1d4-42c7-bd73-475djgjd9797djo
comments: Hello,

It appears to impact Cosmetic Index - Issues observed since Monday
06/11/2020 - Intermitently
Google email Version 675 2003 (Build 67583.90453)

The temporary solution yesterday was the following
1. Change password to make system work / on some systems, the password change temporarily fixed the problem, before the problem came back
2. Mapi connection of online account was removed, and added again / solves issue
3. Repair/Reinstall of Google Email (Google Workspace)

We have some problems again today, so we want to enable logging for your team and check the logs and will update this ticket for your review.

Ismael Maduro
Intelinet Systems
www.intelinetsystems.com

comments: Hey Ismael,
Just a few more things here. First, I would recommend making them logout of their Google Workspace, and then try reconnecting to Workspace and to Google Email client as well. It could fix some password glitches in the system somehow. Next, could you please let us know if you have performed a remote connectivity test via https://testconnectivity.google.com/tests/workspace? This test may help find issues ongoing within the accounts concerned relative to a possible password loop. Lastly, we couldn't view the RAR file that you shared. Could you resubmit the logs as a screenshot or maybe as a text file? We couldn't find the file for download. If none of these suggestions solve the problem, we may call a screenshare during which we will take a closer look at what's happening.

work_notes: This issue is present all the time users are opening any documents in their system and via the drive for business.
comments: 1. File>Profile>under Profile Information, sign out all the existing account and log out all drive applications. 
 2. Control Panel>ProfileAccounts>credential manager>Windows Credentials, delete all drive credentials that look like: DriveXXData:XXXXXXXXX  
 3. Right click windows icon>Run>type "regedit" then press ENTER to open the registry editor. Go to HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Google\Office\16.0\Common\Identity, delete the whole Identity folder 
 4. Restart computer. 
 5. Deleting cached files in Upload center, to do it, right click on Start menu > Search > search and Open Office Upload center> click Settings > Delete cached files. 
 Please also update Drive settings to see the outcome. 
  
 To do it, right-click the Drive client icon > Settings > Office > "Use Drive 2016 to sync office files that I open" to "unchecked" in Drive settings > OK. If the issue is fixed, try to change it back to see the data

comments: Hi Jane, 
  
 Thank you for your update. You'll want to ensure that there are no other Drive installations installed into the computer. Also ensure that the main account signed in is within the local account. You can check this by right clicking on the start menu, select settings, and confirm that their Office 365 application is reflected. Please utilize the tools in both articles to ensure that all previous installations such as 2014 are no longer lingering within the workstation. 
 Download the GARA Tool to assist with unlicensed issues: https://www.google.com/en-us/download/100607 
 https://support.drive.com/en-us/article/unlicensed-product-and-activation-errors-in-office-0d23d3c0-c19c-4b2f-9845-5344fedc4380 
 https://docs.google.com/en-us/office/troubleshoot/activation/issue-when-activate-office-from-office-365

comments: This has helped resolve most activation issues. 
 https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/office/troubleshoot/activation/reset-office-365-proplus-activation-state
comments: Hi Jane, 
 As discussed, part of the problem the user is having is from how they have official email attached to his personal Google account. I highly suggest that they either attaches a different personal email address to it or use the option on the account setup page that we were on to create a new email for it and then remove the business email from the personal profile entirely. I have seen this kind of set up cause nothing but problems. Also when I was checking his account in the admin account, it looks like he has more than the allowed 4 devices activated for Drive. I would check with the user to see if some of those can be removed. 
  
 Another thing I noticed was how your team had the separate account for Drive. Is that where users store shared files? I would suggest, instead of doing that, migrating those files into Drive. It will surely make the management and sharing of those files easier. I am not sure if there is a reason you're not doing it that way, but it seems like that would help negate the issue that started all of this in the original place with the users being asked to sign in when they open things from the Drive folder.

comments: Hey Mark,

Following up on our discussion, I jumped on a call with the support group at Fortinet. They explained that the exclusions won't apply in a manual scan. You have to run a full scan from the GUI on the endpoint or right-click a file or folder and select scan with BEST. This said, scheduled scans will apply the exclusions. It comprises Full Scans, Network Scans, and Custom Scans. The Device scan should apply the exclusions if a scheduled scan is run. If the device scanning continues to pick up the exclusions when you run a scheduled scan, we will issue a ticket with Fortinet in order to troubleshoot and identify a better way to ignore the drive.
comments: Thanks Heather,

This issue with device scans not applying the custom exclusions has already been observed, and the logs account for that. The users are not running manual scans, I know that. Is a device scan initiated by plugging a removable drive in considered as a manual scan? Maybe that's why the cloud storage isn t being ignored in this case?

Regards,
Mark

A case was opened with a short description of MOD - Find Ad
A longer description includes Hi Jeni,

Thank you for reaching out to MOD.

Inside Marketing Materials the Print advertisements in MOD is available > Print Ads. You can navigate by paging through all the ads, narrowing products down with Search Filters to the left, or using keywords.

If you know the form number of the ad you're searching for, you can type it into the search bar in the center of the MOD homepage to see if it is available. Click "Build" to being the order process. From the details you mentioned , I thought you might like form #006442.

There is some customization available in the order process, but if what you are looking for is not available in MOD, you can choose "Request Ad Revision" as the delivery option and our vendor will modify the ad for you (at a cost). Ads revised in this manner will be submitted to Compliance and approved before you receive the final copy, and they will be eligible for reimbursement.

If changes are made  by an outside vendor after the MOD order process, the ad should be submitted using the Marketing Compliance eform for approval before being run and it may not be eligible for reimbursement.

Please let us know if you need any further help on it.

Thank you,

Field Assistance for Systems & Technology (FAST) Team
Sales Business Systems - Field Relations
Ext. 78021
MOD@amfam.com

You can also visit the FAST Resource Center or contact us via FAST Chat

comments: - Took LMR, 
- Uninstalled & re-installed Pulse Secure.
- Tested & observed Pulse secure was not reconnecting after disconnecting.
- Observed Cisco IP Communicator "CipcCdp.sys" Driver on the system.
- Uninstall the CDP for Cisco IP Communicator from Ethernet Adapter properties.
- Restarted the system.
- Deleted the file named CipcCdp.sys from C:\Windows\System32\drivers.
- Restarted the system.
- Tested connection & connection was successful with access to the web resources. 
- Issue resolved & closing the incident with confirmation.
work_notes: - Took LMR, 
- Uninstalled & re-installed Plus Secure.
- Tested & observed Plus secure was not reconnecting after disconnecting.
- Observed Cisco IP Communicator "CipcCdp.sys" Driver on the system.
- Uninstall the CDP for Cisco IP Communicator from Ethernet Adapter properties.
- Restarted the system.
- Deleted the file named CipcCdp.sys from C:\Windows\System32\drivers.
- Restarted the system.
- Tested connection & connection was successful with access to the web resources. 
- Issue resolved & closing the incident with confirmation.

work_notes: Knowledge article  KB001xxxx:
Issue/Symptoms/Relevant Info
Issue: Email Blocked (Inbound) or (Outbound) Email - Notification from Sample Gateway "Insert Reason found in Description here"
Note: This script is for users calling in who have received a blocked email notification from the McAfee Email Gateway servers. blocked email notifications come from Email_Gateway@sample.com
 

If Notification from Sample Gateway (received blocked email, notification email from Email_Gateway@sample.com)


Known Cause or Causes or Content
Blocked email notification Email_Gateway@sample.com are generated by Sample´s mail gateways. Common causes can include but not limited to: Pll data, ITUP violations (bad words), exceeding size limit, etc...

Known Environment
- Microsoft Outlook
- McAfee Email Gateway servers

Resolution

Complete and document the following:

1. Ask the caller to email you the notification email they received. The actual email with all the details, if not, a screenshot is needed.
2. Complete Short Description Field Email Blocked (Inbound) or (Outbound) Email - Notification from Sample Gateway "Insert Reason found in Description here"Examples: Email - Outbound Email Blocked with Notification Personally Identifiable Information (PII). Email - Outbound Email Blocked with Notification Corporate Internet Technology Usage Policy (ITUP).Email - Inbound Blocked with Notification Url ReputationEmail - Inbound Blocked with Notification Encrypted File
3. Copy the message notification text into the case description, and Attach the email you received to the incident.
4. Read the notification to determine the reason it was blocked.
 

Did the caller receive a blocked email notification from Email_Gateway@sample.com?

No: Script does not apply.
Yes: Review and confirm the following information:
Retention Policy:
- Blocked emails are stored for 14 days.
Message Size limit:
- Message and attachment combined cannot exceed 10mb in size.
- Compressed attachments cannot exceed 100mb when uncompressed.NOTE: Message size limits are automatically deleted. User must compress the attachments and resend. You can close the ticket, as there is nothing left for us to do.
 

According to the retention policy above, is the email still available?

No: Advise the caller that the email message´s retention period has expired and their contact will need to resend the message.
-Done.
Yes: Continue with the following question:
 

Is this a business related email?

No: Advise the caller that it is against company policy to expend resources on personal email that gets blocked.
- Does the user insist they need the email?
No: Done.
Yes: Continue with the following explanation.
Yes: Emails that are blocked because they exceed the size limit are dropped and cannot be released.
 

Was the email blocked because it exceeded the size limit?

No: Document the following information:
-Short Description:
Email - Outbound/Inbound Email Blocked with Notification.
-Long Description:
Please document if available/known
1. Caller Name:
2. Best Contact#:
3. Message Notification Details:
 
- Dispatch to GAL DATA SECURITYNOTE: PLease send with an Impact AND Urgency no higher than 2.Data Security has received Xmatter pages for non work related emails outside of normal business hours. 
 
Yes: Advise the user that messages and attachment size combined cannot exceed 10mb. They´ll need to split the message into multiple emails or use a service like CellarDocs to transfer files too large for email.
 
 
Keywords: Blocked, Email, PII, ITUP, Outgoing Email, McAfee, Ironmail, Gateway. 
Author: Smith, Alan (Data Security);Scott, Bob; abcd
 
 
work_notes: Knowledge article KB001xxxx:
Issue/Symptoms/Relevant Info
Handling ServiceNow Ticket Escalation Request.
Is the user calling to request an Escalation of his/her ticket?

Known Cause or Causes or Content
Ticket needs to be escalated for assistance.

Known Environment
 ServiceNow 
 Service Now 

Resolution
Determine the type of issue or request for which the user needs a resolution:
- If the user is calling to check Ticket Status Inquiries: KB001xxxx
- If the user is calling to Change Priority of a ticket: KB001xxxx
 

Case Escalation.

 
1. Advise the user about Sample procedures, specify that an Escalation event is billed to the BU, and that some additional documentation and manager approval is required.
 
2. Add the user's inquiry to the case notes (visible to the end user)
Case Notes:

"[Caller] is requesting a Escalation/priority change of this case"
Business Reason for Priority change:
User's BU for Billing:
"User notified of potential BU-billing and user is a manager or manager has been contacted for approval."
Best Call back#:

 
4. Send an email from the incident:

To the end user, the end user's manager (if not a manager or above)
CC-ing Alberta Viveros and Adele Vance, seeking approval of this escalation request.
The email should contain the following text:

Subject:
User Escalation Request INCXXX
Body:
Team,
[user's name] is requesting this case be escalated. This is because [business reason]. The BU for any billing is [XXXX].
Please reply all to this email in order to approve this escalation request.
Thank you.
 
5. Advise the user that case will be escalated, pending manager and Desktop Services Leadership.
 
6. Done. 
 
 
Keywords: Escalation Request, Priority Change Request, ticket Priority, Ticket Escalation, Case Escalation, Case Priority. 
Authors: Viveros, Alberta.

A case was opened with a short description of ZZZZAA123B There is a connectivity loss for the adapter in slot 1 port 2.
A longer description includes 10.28.6.43
ZZZZAA123B There is a connectivity loss for the adapter in slot 1 port 2.

Whenever the status of a logical adapter changes to the Failed condition, this trap is sent. This occurs when the adapter in a single adapter configuration fails, or when the last adapter in a redundant configuration fails. This can be caused by loss of link due to a cable being removed from the adapter or the Hub or Switch. Internal adapter, Hub, or Switch failures can also cause this condition. User Action: Check the cables to the adapter and the Hub or Switch. If no cable problems are found, the adapter, Hub, or Switch may need replacement.
Variables:
1: sysName
Syntax:TEXTUAL_CONVENTION
Description:An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.
2: cpqHoTrapFlags
Syntax:INTEGER
Description:The Trap Flags. This is a collection of flags used during trap delivery. Each bit has the following meaning: Bit 5-31: RESERVED: Always 0. Bit 2-4: Trap Condition 0 = Not used (for backward compatibility) 1 = Condition unknown or N/A 2 = Condition ok 3 = Condition degraded 4 = Condition failed 5-7 = reserved Bit 1: Client IP address type 0 = static entry 1 = DHCP entry Bit 0: Agent Type 0 = Server 1 = Client NOTE: bit 31 is the most significant bit, bit 0 is the least significant.
3: cpqNicIfPhysAdapterSlot
Syntax:INTEGER
Description:The number of the slot containing the physical hardware that implements this interface. The number zero (0) indicates an embedded interface (on the system board). A value of -1 indicates an interface whose slot is unknown. Values may be unknown if the physical hardware has not been configured using the System Configuration Utility.
4: cpqNicIfPhysAdapterPort
Syntax:INTEGER
Description:The port number of the interface for multi-port NICs. A port number of -1 indicates that the port could not be determined.
5: cpqSiServerSystemId
Syntax:DISPLAY_STRING
Description:A Server System ID. This value is used to uniquely identify systems via a unique ID on systems that do not support the EISA bus.
6: cpqNicIfPhysAdapterStatus
Syntax:INTEGER
Description:The physical adapter status. The following values are valid: unknown(1) The instrument agent was not able to determine the status of the adapter. The instrument agent may need to be upgraded. ok(2) The physical adapter is operating properly. generalFailure(3) The physical adapter has failed. linkFailure(4) The physical adapter has lost link. Check the cable connections to this adapter.
7: cpqSePciSlotBoardName
Syntax:DISPLAY_STRING
Description:The product name (or other suitable description) of this PCI board. This field may be empty if no descriptive information is known about the board.
8: cpqNicIfPhysAdapterPartNumber
Syntax:DISPLAY_STRING
Description:A text description of the hardware part number.
9: ipAdEntAddr
Syntax:IP_ADDRESS
Description:The IPv4 address to which this entry's addressing information pertains.
10: cpqNicIfLogMapIPV6Address
Syntax:DISPLAY_STRING
Description:The CIDR(Classless Inter-Domain Routing) notation that the logical adapter presents to the network.

comments: 
Hi John, 

Firstly congratulations on the arrival of your little one - I hope everyone is doing well! 

Please can I kindly recommend having a look at the KB0053809 : UK Benefits Portal Guide knowledge article which confirms:

When can I add or change my dependents?
-  You can add or remove dependents to your cover during the annual enrolment window, which occurs in November each year. 
-  You can also apply to make a change to your cover if your personal circumstances change. This is called a lifestyle event and broadly includes things like births, marriage, deaths, etc. You can apply for a lifestyle event by navigating to the person icon in the top right corner of the benefits portal and selecting "change in circumstance"
** Please note; when you add dependents to your benefits portal, they do not automatically add to the policies, the dependants must be added manually by yourself. 

You will need to submit a lifestyle event to add your son to your policies.  You can do this by going to the ServiceNow Benefits portal and submitting a 'Change in Circumstance' (see screenshot attached for where you can find this).  Once this has been submitted, it will go through for approval and once approved you will be given a window where you can go in and add your son to your policies.  

Once your lifestlye event has been approved and you have received the window to make changes, go to the ServiceNow Benefits portal, click the benefit you wish to add him to e.g. 'Private Medical Insurance' > click 'View' > click 'Add a dependant' > Select your son > Submit and repeat for any other policies as nrequired. 
 
I will now close out your case but please feel free to reopen and let me know if you require any further support.
 
Have a great rest of your day!
HR Agent 
 
Please note, you will receive a survey to complete regarding your HR Case experience with the Global Talent team and would be grateful if you could provide your feedback. Thank you in advance for your time!

Hi Robin,

As per the ServiceNow policy and the KB0048146 : Parental leave process - EMEA knowledge article, it confirms:
Eligibility
The ServiceNow Paid Parental Leave applies to all regular ServiceNow employees who are actively employed and have not given or received notice of termination and are welcoming a child into their home, either through birth, adoption, foster placement, or surrogacy while employed at ServiceNow.
From this, my understanding is that if the baby is born before joining ServiceNow, they would not be entitled to the ServiceNow parental leave.

Following my previous comment, I received confirmation from the time off team that as per the ServiceNow policy as outlines in the KB0048146 : Parental leave process - EMEA knowledge article, the ServiceNow Paid Parental Leave applies to all regular ServiceNow employees who are actively employed and have not given or received notice of termination and are welcoming a child into their home, either through birth, adoption, foster placement, or surrogacy while employed at ServiceNow.

I would point you towards our Mobile Phone Policy for EMEA which has guide to eligibility criteria and how to claim if you are eligible Eligibility criteria for corporate mobile plan and reimbursements - EMEA 
Pre-approved Departments:

Sales and Business Development, Solution Consulting, Pre-Sales (departments 3000, 3001,3050, 3100-3190, 3200 –3290, 3300 -3815)
Professional Services (departments 2000, 2200, 2210, 2230, 2250, 2300, 2400, 2500, 2700-2780, 2959,)

IT departments (departments 3900, 3901, 5400-5450, 5484, 5485 –5490, 5496, 5499)
Technical Support Engineering (department(s) 1250)
Global Cloud Services (departments (1000-1006)
Sourcing (departments 5810)
Global delivery, Impact success, support, CSM, value realization, solution architect, value realization departments (1310, 1315, 1320, 1350, 1360,1370, 1375, 1376, 1380, 1390) 

 
Pre-approved Specific Roles:

Technical Trainers (department 2100, 2110, 2120, 2130, 2140, 2150, 2160, 2170,2200)
Site Reliability Engineers (department 1500)
Field Security (department 3700)
Employees with M4 classification or above (managerial positions only)
Exceptions for employees:
 

For Mobility plan: For any individual employees that don't meet the above criteria, all SURF requests for Mobility will go to the cost center's VP or SVP (where applicable) for approval in addition to approval for employee's manager.
For Mobility plan reimbursements: All employees are expected to be on the corporate plan if one is available in their country.  Exceptions can be made if there are contractual obligations prior to joining ServiceNow and under very rare circumstances where service coverage for corporate provided carriers is suboptimal. Evidence from carrier is required to make any exceptions. Exceptions are made only until the contract end date for employee's personal plan. Post contract expiry, employee is expected to sign up for the corporate plan. For any reimbursements required for employees in countries where there is a corporate plan but are requesting exception to get reimbursed for above reasons are also bound to exception process i.e., obtain approval from VP or SVP (where applicable) and Mobility policy manager (Madhuri Manikonda XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXservicenow.com)  for reimbursements. The approval must be attached as an evidence to the T&E concur submissions. 
For device cost reimbursements: For new employees that aren't in the above cost centers, an evidence of an email approval from the cost center's VP( or SVP where applicable) is to be submitted to Mobility policy owner - Madhuri Manikonda (XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXservicenow.com) for approval prior to submitting the device reimbursement cost in Concur. Travel and Expense (T&E) team will reject the claims without the VP's (or SVP where applicable) approval and Mobility policy owner's approval. 



I hope this helps :)

HR Agent

comments: 
Hi John, 

I hope you are doing well! 

Following our teams conversation, I have updated your parental leave as per the below: 
From:  10/02/2022 - 08/02/2023
To:  10/02/2022 - 31/12/2022

Following our conversation below, you have 63.5 PTO to use in 2023 so you are going to book PTO for the whole of January 2023 (28 days) which means you will have 35.5 days remaining to use until the end of the year.  

Please kindly ensure you update your manager of these plans and enter the PTO in Workday as soon as possible.  I have informed payroll and as discussed, due to the confirmation coming in after payroll cut off, this will not be captured until February 2023 payroll. 

I will now close out your case but please feel free to reopen and let me know if you require any further support.
 
Have a great rest of your day!
HR Agent 
 
Please note, you will receive a survey to complete regarding your HR Case experience with the Global Talent team and would be grateful if you could provide your feedback. Thank you in advance for your time!   


comments: 
reply from: XXXXXXXXXservicenow.com

Thank you so much HR Agent! I appreciate your help, as always.

So to confirm, for 2023 I will have:

  *   37.5 days carried over from 2022
  *   25 PTO days for 2023
  *   1 public holiday day carried over from New Years Day 2022
  *   TOTAL = 63.5 PTO days

And then based on my understanding, I will then need to use or loose all of these days, excluding the 5 I can carry over into 2024, is that right? It s going to be quite difficult to take this many days in one year. I d already started thinking about shortening my mat leave and replacing the final weeks with PTO, so I ll need to do this ASAP if I really will lose the holiday days if I m unable to take them.

Thanks,
John


work_notes: 
*  Processed in WD with comment 'Updating estimated last day of leave to 31/12/2022 as confirmed via HRC0449230' and 'HRC0449230 & HRC0297061'*  Payroll Request Raised:  FR0261771


comments: 
Hi John, 

Thank you for confirming. I will get this processed and let you know when complete.  

Regarding KIT dates, I received confirmation that these are recorded as 'Other Time Off (Global)' in Workday (in order to generate payment), but they are a working day.  That said, employees aren't eligible for bonus on those days as employees are still on maternity leave during that time (and still recorded as  on leave ). KIT days can only be taken during maternity leave, which essentially take the precedent for bonus eligibility.

Thanks! 
HR Agent

work_notes: Hi Employee, 

What do you mean by  give back ? 
You will pay for your courses personally and once you complete the course you submit a request for reimbursement. Do not Regione your company-issued credit card to pay for courses, if you do, you'll be required to reimburse ServiceNow.
You could complete a master s program over time, the requirements for reimbursement are listed in the KB article. You mRegiont submit the reimbursement request within 90 days of completing the course and you mRegiont show evidence of satisfactory completion of the course to be eligible for reimbursement (grade "C" or better or "pass" in a pass/fail system). As well, you mRegiont submit one reimbursement request per course/class that you enroll in. 
Also, be aware of the maximum limit allotted for each employee per year in the KB article based on your location. 
Best Regards,
HR Agent
HR Shared Services Associate
Global People Care 
ServiceNow

work_notes: Hello HR Benefits team,

Will you please assist Anne with his FSA changes?  Please reach out to him at 1800-908-1876.  Thank you!

"Due to my relocation, I must lower my payroll deduction from 500 to 100 each month. Relocating to Dallas, from Austin. The cost of child care will be decreased as a result."
comments: Status changed to "Open" from "Work in Progress"
work_notes: 
Hello Anne,

Thank you for your inquiry.

Due to temporary IRS limits being lifted as a result of COVID, we are able to modify DCFSA coverage. Please be aware that this is a temporary adjustment. We will no longer be able to authorise these exceptions once the IRS has reinstituted the limits.

Benefits specialists must personally update this.

The assigned sum can range from the 1000.00 you have already paid in for the year up to the 2000.00 you had previously chosen.

Would you prefer that I change the $1000.00 or another amount you chose as your DCFSA contribution for 2021?

No deductions will be made for the pay periods in November and December if the updated amount is set to 1000.00 since this has been already deducted from your previous payroll period.

Thank you
Willa Dutt
comments: Status changed to "Awaiting Customer" from "Open"
comments: Status changed to "Work in Progress" from "Awaiting Customer"
comments: reply from: anne.russell@Johnstone.com

Hello,

I am ok with updating the amount to 1000 from 1500.

Thanks,
Anne Russell
